name: Strategic Design Network
overview:
Strategic Design Network focuses on the ultimate gaming experience for our players. The playerâ€™s voice is a core component of the development and enhancement of our games. Unlike other game companies, which have become so large that the focus on the player has been â€œlostâ€, our philosophy is to invest in the playerâ€™s gaming experience. As a result we will set the bar for what we call the customer experience. Strategic Design Network takes pride in providing our players with the total package â€“ the ultimate gaming experience with customer service above our competition.

Currently, Strategic Design Network is in various incubation and development phases for over 12 applications and plan to lead the industry with a strong showing of gaming applications. We will dominate the industry with our innovative customer experience plan.

Strategic Design Network has aligned itself with experts in the industry of game design, graphic artistry, web design, media and public relations, and web 2.0 technologies. These strategic alignments have brought together some of the most brilliant and innovative minds to create a better game play experience for users on all social networking platforms. Members of the team regularly brainstorm and freely share ideas to come up with the next big game ideas. The team is able to quickly and decisively execute plans to remain not only competitive and up-to-date but a leader in the quickly changing market place.

Some of our games are based on current events â€“ the very things you are reading about in the paper, watching on the news and worrying about today. In our virtual world you can have some control over these circumstances.
